Main Event: Kleber Koike Erbst (31-6-1) vs. Chihiro Suzuki (10-3-0) Co-Main Event: Yusuke Yachi (24-13-0) vs. Zach Zane (15-14-0) Main Card: Hideki Sekine (12-6-0) vs. Mikio Ueda (1-1-0) Main Card: Hiroaki Suzuki (2-3-0) vs. Taisei Nishitani (6-5-0) Main Card: Genji Umeno vs. Hiroki Suzuki Main Card: Minoru Kimura vs. Daryl Lokoku Main Card: Yuta Kubo (1-1-0) vs. Takeaki Kinoshita (6-6-1) Main Card: Saori Oshima (11-3-0) vs. Haruka Hasegawa (3-2-0) Main Card: Suguru Nii (14-12-0) vs. Tateo Iida (12-6-2) Main Card: Tetsuya Seki (15-9-1) vs. Raiki Endo (15-11-5) Main Card: Trent Girdham (13-4-0) vs. Joji Goto (14-6-1) Main Card: Marina Kumagai (3-4-0) vs. Aoi Kuriyama (4-5-1) Main Card: Kensei Yamakawa vs. Ryoga Hirano Prelim: Toshiki Watanabe (19-7-4) vs. Kento Azumi (2-1-0) Prelim: Daiki Maruyama (0-2-0) vs. Suguru Hayasaka (19-15-5) Prelim: Aito Tanimura vs. Ryuya Koide Prelim: Shoki Hoshikubo vs. Kazuyuki Furukawa
